profile.shortDescription: +5 years as a full stack developer using Laravel + Vue.js to deliver user friendly solutions.

about.title: More about me
about.presentation: My name is Rodrigo, I'm a developer from Chile. I discover programming at the university and that unfold a world of infinite possibilities.
about.hobbies: I'm a Judoka, I practice this sport since 2015 and also love to read fantasy books. Big fan of The Stormlight Archive. And sometimes I built model kits of Gundams.
